data.name: Cato Demo
data.detailed_description:
Cat + Toast = Cato = Buttered cat paradox = Anti-gravity

A puzzle platformer made during 2022 BOOOM Gamejam

Instructions

  • Toast jump = SpaceÔºåtoast switch direction = Shift
  • Kitty move = arrow keys
  • Cato jump/float = SpaceÔºådisassemble = z
R = restart

From developer

Made during 2022 BOOOM Gamejam. Demo is coming soon. We've decided to develop it into a complete Steam game!
